    • getAllCourse

      List<vss.common.Course> getAllCourse()
      get all of the courses' information
      返回:
      all courses

    • sigAddCourse

      boolean sigAddCourse​(String couseID, String uID)
      students choose lessons
      参数:
      couseID - the course's ID
      uID - the student's Id who choosing the lesson
      返回:
      return a value of boolean, showing this function success or fail

    • sigRemoveCourse

      boolean sigRemoveCourse​(String courseID, String uID)
      student remove the lesson they have chosen
      参数:
      courseID - the course's ID
      uID - the student's Id who removing the lesson
      返回:
      return a value of boolean, showing this function success or fail

    • genAddCourse

      boolean genAddCourse​(vss.common.Course course)
      teacher add lesson
      参数:
      course - all of the course's information which the teacher add
      返回:
      return a value of boolean, showing this function success or fail

    • genRemoveCourse

      boolean genRemoveCourse​(String courseID)
      teacher remove lesson
      参数:
      courseID - the course's ID which will be removed
      返回:
      return a value of boolean, showing this function success or fail

    • searchCourseByID

      vss.common.Course searchCourseByID​(String coutseID)
      search course by its courseID from database
      参数:
      coutseID - the course's ID
      返回:
